description:
Not all who wander are lost. Except for Haru`s master, that is. She`s totally lost.
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: Nantoka no Wakusei / Kawanaru Kankei / Hanashi no Tsuujinai Inu, Chizu no Yomenai Onna
Planet of the Something or Other / Unchanging Relationship / A Dog Who Won`t Understand, a Girl Who Can`t Read a Map
ナントカの惑星 / 変わらぬ関係 / 話の通じない犬, 地図の読めない女
